Class AlertSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.AlertSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericSceneController
public class AlertSceneController extends Object implements GenericSceneController
This class implements the controller of a generic Alert Scene.
